titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a rebate program to promote the purchase and installation of electric vehicle supply equipment for medium- and heavy-duty vehicles, and for other purposes.
Medium- and Heavy-Duty Electric Vehicle Infrastructure Act of 2021
Medium- and Heavy-Duty Electric Vehicle Infrastructure Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Medium- and Heavy-Duty Electric Vehicle Infrastructure Act of 2021
This bill directs the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a rebate program that encourages the purchase and installation of electric vehicle charging equipment for medium-duty electric vehicles and heavy-duty electric vehicles.
